summary: Feature request to support readonly properties in workflow and activity input objects. Currently, properties must be set individually after object creation, which is incompatible with readonly fields.
userImpact: Users cannot use readonly properties in DTO classes for workflow and activity arguments, limiting their ability to use immutable patterns.
rootCause: The SDK sets object properties individually after instantiation, which bypasses constructor-based initialization required for readonly properties.
workaround: Avoid using readonly properties in DTO classes for workflow and activity inputs.
resolutionDetails: Pull request #232 added unit tests demonstrating that readonly properties in DTOs work correctly with workflow and activity arguments.
keyQuote: readonly properties in DTO's are actually work.
